item.description:
## Release Notes * Fix index out of range CTD while parsing some seemingly invalid mod descriptors * Handle large collection exports by supporting zip64 * Show overlay when deleting large mod collections * Minor fixes
## Changes From v1.19 * Update dependencies * Upgrade to net6.0 * Make Irony compliant with new Paradox Launcher 2021.10 formats
